description:
If you live in Forsyth County and anywhere in the Piedmont Triad region and you suffered a serious injury or loss caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the legal professionals at the Lanier Law Group P.A. in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, to help you fight for the justice you deserve.

Regarded as one of North Carolina's premier injury law firms, we have 11 law offices across the state. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our clients who have catastrophic personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, sexual assault, defective products, unsafe property conditions, workplace accidents and other preventable tragedies.

We also handle workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, and we promise to do all we can to improve the likelihood you will obtain the full amount of finances you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages.

Nationally recognized as among the best attorneys in the country, our lawyers have earned designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Perhaps more importantly, we have also received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients who have offered praise about our superior client service and unwavering dedication to their needs.

To put a heavyweight in your corner who will fight hard to help you obtain the justice you deserve, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. to schedule a free initial consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations in an effort to help keep you and your loved ones safe in these uncertain times.
